title: Radical Index
text: What is the index of the radical?

title: Even radical index
text: The radical index is 2, it is even. However, the denominator can not equal 0. We need the value of $$\frac{6}{x-1}$$ be greater than 0.

title: Solve the Inequality
text: Since the numerator is positive, to get $$\frac{6}{x-1}>0$$, we only need to ensure the denominator is positive. Solve $$x-1>0$$.

title: Find the domain
text: To solve $$x-1>0$$, we can add 1 both side which gives $$x>1$$ as the final answer.
